price: 27. Dan Kami jadikan padanya gunung-gunung yang tinggi, dan Kami beri minum kamu dengan air tawar?
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِيَ شَٰمِخَٰتٖ وَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰكُم مَّآءٗ فُرَاتٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnā fīhā rawāsiya shāmikhātin wa-asqaynākum māan furātan
translations: and We gave you to drink
